    • About Greg McDaniel


    With over 70 years real estate experience between the three partners, McDaniel Callahan TEAM has helped over 1800 families buy or sell a Bay area home. That level of experience means McDaniel Callahan can sell your Bay area home for more money in less time, and help you find your dream home at the best price and terms.

    Featuring a strong administrative team that handles all the critical details of every transaction, and availability of all three partners to each client, McDaniel Callahan can make your move a stress-free experience.
